Note! Some clicks in this test will fail to demonstrate the screenshot production during failures.

de.cologneintelligence.fitgoodies.selenium.SeleniumFixture
open /
windowMaximize y
click name=q
typeAndRetry name=q selenium
clickAndRetry link=Selenium IDE Plugins
click force screenshot production
open /
typeAndRetry name=q screenshot
clickAndRetry //a[contains(text(),'Wikipedia')]
click force second screenshot production
